reviews.text: The staff was welcoming. The room was neat and clean. The included breakfast was very good too. This hotel is located immediately outside the Newark Airport. I stayed on business travel. If business brings me this way again, I would stay at this hotel again.
reviews.title: A Pleasant Experience

reviews.text: I was staying for one night to catch a flight the next morning. I have stayed at different Hampton Inn;s and had certain expectations. I was very pleasantly surprised that this hotel exceeded my expectations. The staff was fantastic, the rooms were a better quality then most Hampton Inn's. THe breakfast was the typical one and the free internet worked well. There was a bit too long of a wait to be picked up at the airport.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: I would not hesitate to recommend this property or to stay there again.
reviews.title: Solid Hampton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here 3 nights while on business. Friendly staff, close to the airport, the rooms in good condition. What more can you ask for. Breakfast a bit weak for normal Hampton Inns but that seems to be mainly based on the size of the breakfast area. No restaurants nearby but the Hilton is right next door so that was an option at least.
reviews.title: brilliant

reviews.text: The two of us stayed here a week 16 feb -22 feb. it would take one ignorant person to find any fault with this hotel. from reception staff to cleanliness nothing was too much to ask. staff welcoming and friendly and top marks to our shuttle driver his chat was too funny and nothing was too much to ask of him. room was spotless and comfortable. Breakfast....oooh waffle machines mmmm oatmeal fresh fruit sausage doughnuts u name it they had it. breakfast staff friendly . made our first visit to USA real special would love to join you all again. thank u so much.
reviews.title: Clean, comfortable and convenient.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here one night before going to Newark Airport. No complaints - staff was friendly, parking our car was $10 a day (while we were away for 5 days), shuttle was on time, room was clean and bright, complimentary breakfast was terrific: waffles, fresh fruit, cereal, eggs, juices, buns, etc...highly recommend! No restaurant here, but we walked next door to the Renaissance Hotel - food was delicious!
reviews.title: Great hotel near the airport!

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for one night with other staff. There were several changes to our reservation, and I worried that not all would get corrected. They didn't. Luckily I had travel info with me, or I may have been short a room on a night the hotel was sold out. Once we got things squared away at check in and went to our rooms, the trip settled down. The rooms are clean, plenty of towels, nice quick start breakfast. There's no restaurants close by but you can order in or walk next door to the Hilton and eat there. The hotel has an airport shuttle, but we had cars so I don't know that schedule. For the price and distance to the airport, I would stay here again.
reviews.title: Hampton Inn Newark Airport

reviews.text: Near the airport, staff was helpful, room was clean. Only advisory is make sure you close the toilet lid when reaching for towel. Towel rack is above toilet and I learned this lesson the hard way. Other than that room was clean, bed was clean, hotel staff was friendly, fresh cookies everyday. It's what you expect from a Hilton Property.
reviews.title: Good Stay

reviews.text: Landed late night on a Friday and just missed the parked Shuttle at P4. However the wait was not too long (maybe 15 mins) before the next one came along.
reviews.title: Comfort
Excellent airport stopover
reviews.text: Check in was a breeze. Found the room to be very clean and the king sized bed was very comfortable. Great breakfast, had what was needed to fill you up.

In spite of considerable jetlag, I managed to get some sleep here. They have a very courteous shuttle driver who gets you basically anywhere you want, as long as you tip him appropriately;-). The noisy fridge can be plugged out. Remarkably quiet location...
reviews.title: Great

reviews.text: A very good choice close to EWR. Modern rooms, lots of parking, efficient staff. Stayed one night and had a good experience. The shuttle service worked well in the morning (11am). Would stay here again.
reviews.title: Good hotel, modern room, Nice service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel on NYE, we arrived in Newark airport around 11 pm, and were waiting for the hotel transfer from 11.35 pm, but it arrived at P4 station only at 12.20 am and waited till 12.30 to take us to the hotel. It seemed that neither the driver nor the man at reception were glad to work at NYE. Nobody smiled at us. But the rest was good. The room and the bathroom are big and clean, there is coffee machine in the room, and also there is an opportunity to drink coffee and tea at reception round the clock.
reviews.title: Good stay in airport hotel

reviews.text: The breakfast is tasty and various. And in the morning the man on reception was smiling and seemed happy to have us at the hotel.
reviews.title: Great Front Desk Staff!!!

reviews.text: So the overall impression is good, just don't arrive there on NYE))
reviews.title: Standard Hampton Inn but infrequent shuttles

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had an early flight from Newark Airport and decided to come to an airport hotel the night before. We chose the hotel for the Hampton Inn name, closeness to Newark Airport, price, and the parking option while we were on vacation
reviews.title: Would stay again

reviews.text: We stayed here for a few days so we could spend some time in New York city before heading off on our trip. The shuttle service drivers were extremely helpful and introduced us to an excellent restaurant nearby.
reviews.title: Good hotel for the airport

reviews.text: We stayed here for one night prior to a cruise out of Manhattan. Airport pickup was prompt, rooms were beautiful and very clean. I love the idea of the freshly laundered duvet and wish every hotel did that. Breakfast was awesome and served in the nicest dining area we have ever been in for a 'complimentary' breakfast. Special thanks to the two lovely ladies who were overseeing the breakfast. I had a swallowing mishap and I had a glass of water placed in front of me before I could even quit coughing. They were both friendly and attentive. With very little choice nearby for dining, we ordered in pizza from one of the menus provided at the front desk. It was average but fairly quick.
reviews.title: Excellent Property

reviews.text: We will definitely stay again if we have occasion to be in the area.
reviews.title: Southern Hospitality in New Jersey.

reviews.text: Southern style hospitality in New Jersey. Staff and facilities were above average. The shuttle service was excellent. Shuttle driver went out of his way to find me a restaurant. Great experience. If location is important this is the place to stay.
reviews.title: The place to stay for a stop over in Newark
